title: my league client wont open..?
body: So, after the "massive update" i clicked my league launcher and it goes on "League of Legends" logo and just freezes there and does not open for me. What do i do? i tried running as admin and restarting but nothing seems to work?

replies.body: EDIT: So, the client opened but now its stuck on 0%(Calculating Differences, 1 files scanned) and wont move from there on. Already left it like that for 30mins. Still no progress....
Are you on Windows? If so, try making another user and booting it up. That's what I did after three months after a blank login screen.
Tried. Didn't work... And mine doesn't even go on the client to patch. It just freezes with the league of legends logo with the little loading bar on the bottom which does not move. :/
Have you tried uninstalling it and reinstalling it?
Also having problems starting up LOL - won't go to patching/launching screen, but when i check Processes in Task Manager shows LOLlaucher and LolPatcher working in the background. :(
